brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts using an M UA client and MTA and MDA servers as a continuation of Diagram 3. The client sends the e-mail to Server 1 using SMTP, and Server 1 forwards e-mail to Server 2 using SMTP. The e-mail is delivered from Server 2 to the recipient using POP.

Caption text: "SMTP is used to forward e-mail. POP is used to deliver e-mail."
